description: Leading development of large-scale RAG systems for enterprise document intelligence.
Optimized inference latency by 40% using model quantization and custom CUDA kernels.
Mentoring a team of 4 junior engineers on best practices for production ML.
Published 3 papers in top-tier AI conferences (NeurIPS, ICML) on efficient transformer architectures.
Developed a novel pruning technique that reduces model size by 3x with <1% accuracy loss.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement research prototypes in production.
